meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Watson Bhaskara Marthi Susan Cole Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7379.

td.p: Amanda Watson, a medical student from Tulsa, Oklahoma
Bhaskara Marthi, a researcher from Sunnyvale, California
Susan Cole, a legislative librarian from Bowie, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,600)

tr.td: TV THEMES
MATH
GEOGRAPHIC TERMS
LADIES & GENTLEMEN
STEP RIGHT "UP"
CIRCUS PERFORMERS
